types.html:
passer à la vitesse supérieure

  1. (figuratively) to go up a gear, to move up a gear, to step up a gear, to shift up a gear, to move things up a gear, to speed things up, to shift into high gear, to take things up a notch, to move into overdrive

See also

[edit]
  • passer la seconde
  • en quatrième vitesse
  • mettre le turbo
  • monter d'un cran
trans: to go up a gear, to move up a gear, to step up a gear, to shift up a gear, to move things up a gear, to speed things up, to shift into high gear, to take things up a notch, to move into overdrive

title: passer à la vitesse supérieure
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pa.se a la vi.tɛs sy.pe.ʁjœʁ/ ~ /pɑ.se a la vi.tɛs sy.pe.ʁjœʁ/, (more formal) /pa.se.ʁ‿a la vi.tɛs sy.pe.ʁjœʁ/ ~ /pɑ.se.ʁ‿a la vi.tɛs sy.pe.ʁjœʁ/
